review: Super easy set up. No problems at all. I am so happy I bought this.I still need to make time to go through all the cool features you get with this.
author: Alma Shineman

review: As expected. Easy to install and use.
author: baxter214

review: Love it!!! I can also access Netflix, hulu, pandora, youtube and more!
author: Rita Anchondo

review: Super fast but menu system is a bit confusingwould be nice to be able to browse music from the stick as opposed to having to add music via prime on the computer
author: JR

review: They keep pushing this release back. Now it's Feb 1st. Can they just not keep up with the demands? Been wanting once since November.
author: Gary J Meulemans

review: Fun interface and a lot of fun apps and movie stations.
author: Eric L Carpenter

review: I Knew I would like the Fire Stick, but it is a great program. Made the TV a smart system.
author: Joyce A Rogers
